entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
